participant_1.name: Charlie
participant_1.personality: Curious and imaginative, loves to play and explore.
participant_1.background: when i grow up i want to be a dog. i like to look at blocks and sing about letters. i like to eat chocolate candy. i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and practical, enjoys the outdoors and solving problems.
participant_2.background: i like to go hiking in the spring. i am a mechanical engineer. i have a black lab named trooper. i live in colorado.
